module: Module-level comment: The altera_reset_synchronizer module synchronizes an asynchronous reset signal to a clock signal to prevent metastability in digital circuits. It features a configurable depth shift register (`altera_reset_synchronizer_int_chain`) that processes the reset input (`reset_in`) based on the `ASYNC_RESET` parameter. If enabled, `reset_in` directly sets the register to high; otherwise, it sequentially shifts through the register with each clock cycle (`clk`), outputting a stable reset signal (`reset_out`). This implementation ensures flexible and reliable reset synchronization across various system requirements.
